projects.title: FITTHINGZ
projects.description: FitThingZ is a web application that connects all players in the world of sport, namely athletes and sports coaches. This application allows athletes to find coaches registered on the platform and to follow their physical progress and their diet. It also allows coaches to manage their profile, manage their clients, provide them with exercises and a personalized diet, and add physical exercises to the platform.

projects.title: AutoPricing
projects.description: A Platform created to speed up commercial project estimating during client talks. Users can enter project specifics into Autopricing, such as the scope, deliverables, and timelines, and the platform's cutting-edge algorithms will produce accurate price estimates.This reduces the need for drawn-out and frequently arbitrary price negotiations.

projects.title: HR Platform
projects.description: A platform made to help HR managers manage their workforce more effectively, plan team-building exercises, and lead workshops and training sessions.HR managers may easily organize and carry out team-building exercises that promote cooperation and members engagement using HRPlatform.

projects.title: Art-Form
projects.description: A Platform that links artists, production companies, and art enthusiasts to facilitate collaboration and the smooth sale of works of art. ArtForm offers a vibrant setting where artists may display their abilities and be seen by a wide range of people. To realize their artistic concepts, production companies can find and work with outstanding artists with ease.

projects.title: BookApp
projects.description: A smartphone application made to make locating and buying books easier. With BookApp, users can quickly and easily discover a huge selection of titles and genres. Users may search for specific books, view suggestions, and find new releases using the app's user-friendly layout.
